title: Acoustics& Noise Control
description: Study of acoustics related to noise and its control; acoustic terminology, wave propagation, wave equation solutions, instrumentation, data processing, room acoustics, noise control, hearing, noise legislation. Crosslisted with AE 4760.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Colleges:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
__HEADER_2__Must be enrolled in one of the following Classes:
prerequisites: MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
